{{Quote|Season Finale. The [[free peoples]] of [[Middle-earth]] struggle against the [[Sauron|forces]] of [[darkness]].|Official Synopsis, [[Amazon Studios]]}}

'''Shadow and Flame''' is the sixteenth episode of [[Amazon Studios]]'s television series, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]''. It is the eighth episode of the second season and it was released on [[3 October|October 3]], [[2024]].
